text: Idi me (bi Suleyman) ewa berewani daye zanine (gotina Suleyman, ji gotina Dawud cetir hate litekirine) me ji herdukan ra ji serokti u zanin aniye. Me ji bona Dawud ra ciya ser nerm kiriye: Ewan (ciyan) bi Dawud ra (gotine) paqiji dibejin. Me cuk ji (ji bona wi ra ser nerm kiriye). Em evan tistan dikarin bikin u (dikin ji)
